name: Fishy Business (itch) (Rasmusdas, Jaco8485, Zicco)
description:
A party game where you fight with your friends to gather the most fish, and become the ultimate penguin. Play with 2-4 people in a fast pace party game.

You can only play with a controller.

Cross / A to Dash 
Square / X to Slap

Left stick to move around

Hold R to restart

Themes from theme garden:

Enclosing and Martial Arts
